plot: Love might entail affection, commitment, excitement, friendship, worship, attachment, intimacy, and sacrifice. Lust could be longing, craving, desire, hunger, burning, or violence. Loneliness may be isolation, solitude, emptiness, vulnerability, heartache, or withdrawal. Life is existence and being or something similar, and this short movie is a brief story of the intersection of the four during one day for one person.
title: Life Love Lust
